35-year-old female.context: The patient is a 35-year-old female with a history of a chronic pharyngitis and obstructive adenotonsillar hypertrophy.

examination under anesthesia.context: Surgical Procedure: Examination under anesthesia with control of right parapharyngeal space hemorrhage.

right parapharyngeal space hemorrhage.context: Surgical Procedure: Examination under anesthesia with control of right parapharyngeal space hemorrhage.

right lower pole bleeder.context: Surgical Findings: Right lower pole bleeder cauterized with electrocautery with good hemostasis.

good hemostasis.context: Surgical Findings: Right lower pole bleeder cauterized with electrocautery with good hemostasis.

tonsillectomy with adenoidectomy.context: However, in the PACU after a coughing spell she began bleeding from the right oropharynx, and was taken back to the operative suite for control of hemorrhage.

coughing spell.context: However, in the PACU after a coughing spell she began bleeding from the right oropharynx, and was taken back to the operative suite for control of hemorrhage.

bleeding from the right oropharynx.context: However, in the PACU after a coughing spell she began bleeding from the right oropharynx, and was taken back to the operative suite for control of hemorrhage.

Crowe-Davis type mouth gag.context: A Crowe-Davis type mouth gag was introduced in the oropharynx and under operating headlight the oropharynx was clearly visualized.

operating headlight.context: A Crowe-Davis type mouth gag was introduced in the oropharynx and under operating headlight the oropharynx was clearly visualized.

small bleeder.context: There was a small bleeder present at the inferior mid pole of the right oropharynx in the tonsillar fossa, this area was cauterized with suction cautery and irrigated.

suction cautery.context: There was a small bleeder present at the inferior mid pole of the right oropharynx in the tonsillar fossa, this area was cauterized with suction cautery and irrigated.

irrigated.context: There was a small bleeder present at the inferior mid pole of the right oropharynx in the tonsillar fossa, this area was cauterized with suction cautery and irrigated.

small amount of oozing.context: There was a small amount of oozing noted in the right tonsillar bed, and this was cauterized with suction cautery.

tonsillar fossa.context: Prior to extubation the patient's tonsillar fossa were injected with a 6 mL of 0.25% Marcaine with 1:100,000 adrenalin solution to facilitate postoperative analgesia and hemostasis.
